<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[To Battle!](/Feats.aspx?ID=6359) <actions string="Single Action or Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351)

</column>

---

With a resounding cry, you rally your ally to take the offensive. Choose one ally in your marshal’s aura who has a reaction available. If you spend 1 action, that ally can use their reaction to immediately [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305). If you spend 2 actions, that ally can use their reaction to immediately [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).
